query.name: admins
query.sql: select OIMR.name, OIMP.first_name + " " + OIMP.last_name as name, OIMP.primary_email FROM oim.resource OIMR JOIN oim.resource_contact OIMRC on OIMRC.resource_id = OIMR.resource_id JOIN oim.person OIMP on OIMP.person_id = OIMRC.person_id GROUP BY OIMR.name, name

query.name: rsv_quality
query.sql: select OIMR.fqdn as fqdn, from_unixtime(truncate(RSVM.timestamp/:span, 0)*:span) as time, SUM(CASE OIMMS.metric_status_description WHEN "OK" THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE OIMMS.metric_status_description WHEN "OK" THEN 0 WHEN "UNKNOWN" THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) from rsvextra.metricdata RSVM join oim.resource OIMR on RSVM.resource_id=OIMR.resource_id join oim.metric_status OIMMS on RSVM.metric_status_id = OIMMS.metric_status_id join oim.metric OIMM on OIMM.metric_id = RSVM.metric_id where RSVM.timestamp >= :starttime AND RSVM.timestamp < :endtime AND OIMR.fqdn regexp :facility AND OIMM.name regexp :metric group by fqdn, time

query.name: rsv_results
query.sql: SELECT OIMR.fqdn as fqdn, OIMM.name as metric_name, OIMMS.metric_status_description as metric_status, from_unixtime(RSVM.timestamp) as timestamp, RSVMD.detail as details FROM rsvextra.metricdata as RSVM JOIN oim.resource OIMR on RSVM.resource_id=OIMR.resource_id JOIN oim.metric_status OIMMS on RSVM.metric_status_id = OIMMS.metric_status_id JOIN oim.metric OIMM on OIMM.metric_id = RSVM.metric_id JOIN rsvextra.metricdetail RSVMD on RSVM.id = RSVMD.id WHERE RSVM.timestamp >= :starttime AND RSVM.timestamp < :endtime AND OIMR.fqdn regexp :facility AND OIMM.name regexp :metric AND OIMMS.metric_status_description regexp :status ORDER BY RSVM.timestamp desc LIMIT :limit

query.name: rsv_reliability
query.sql: select OIMR.fqdn as fqdn, from_unixtime(truncate(RSVM.timestamp/:span, 0)*:span) as time, SUM(CASE OIMMS.metric_status_description WHEN "OK" THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE OIMMS.metric_status_description WHEN "OK" THEN 0 WHEN "UNKNOWN" THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) from rsvextra.metricdata RSVM join oim.resource OIMR on RSVM.resource_id=OIMR.resource_id join oim.metric_status OIMMS on RSVM.metric_status_id = OIMMS.metric_status_id join oim.metric OIMM on OIMM.metric_id = RSVM.metric_id where RSVM.timestamp >= :starttime AND RSVM.timestamp < :endtime AND OIMR.fqdn regexp :facility AND OIMM.name regexp :metric group by fqdn, time

query.name: rsv_reliability_daily
query.sql: select OIMR.fqdn as fqdn, from_unixtime(truncate(RSVM.timestamp/7200, 0)*7200) as time, SUM(CASE OIMMS.metric_status_description WHEN "OK" THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE OIMMS.metric_status_description WHEN "OK" THEN 0 WHEN "UNKNOWN" THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) from rsvextra.metricdata RSVM join oim.resource OIMR on RSVM.resource_id=OIMR.resource_id join oim.metric_status OIMMS on RSVM.metric_status_id = OIMMS.metric_status_id join oim.metric OIMM on OIMM.metric_id = RSVM.metric_id where RSVM.timestamp >= :starttime AND RSVM.timestamp < :endtime AND OIMR.fqdn regexp :facility AND OIMM.name regexp :metric group by fqdn, time

query.name: rsv_reliability_total
query.sql: select OIMR.fqdn as fqdn, from_unixtime(truncate(RSVM.timestamp/7200, 0)*7200) as time, SUM(CASE OIMMS.metric_status_description WHEN "OK" THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE OIMMS.metric_status_description WHEN "OK" THEN 0 WHEN "UNKNOWN" THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) from rsvextra.metricdata RSVM join oim.resource OIMR on RSVM.resource_id=OIMR.resource_id join oim.metric_status OIMMS on RSVM.metric_status_id = OIMMS.metric_status_id join oim.metric OIMM on OIMM.metric_id = RSVM.metric_id where RSVM.timestamp >= :starttime AND RSVM.timestamp < :endtime AND OIMR.fqdn regexp :facility AND OIMM.name regexp :metric group by fqdn, time

query.name: service_to_resource
query.sql: SELECT OIMS.name as service_type, OIMR.name, OIMRG.name as parent_name FROM oim.resource_service OIMRS JOIN oim.service OIMS ON OIMS.service_id = OIMRS.service_id JOIN oim.resource OIMR ON OIMRS.resource_id = OIMR.resource_id JOIN oim.resource_resource_group OIMRRG ON OIMRRG.resource_id = OIMR.resource_id JOIN oim.resource_group OIMRG ON OIMRG.resource_group_id = OIMRRG.resource_group_id JOIN oim.resource_ext_attributes OIME on OIME.resource_id = OIMR.resource_id WHERE OIME.interop_monitoring = 1 and OIMRG.osg_grid_type_id=1 AND (OIMR.active=1 and OIMR.disable=0)

query.name: resource_to_federation
query.sql: SELECT OIMR.name, OIMRE.wlcg_accounting_name FROM oim.resource OIMR JOIN oim.resource_ext_attributes OIMRE ON OIMRE.resource_id= OIMR.resource_id WHERE OIMRE.wlcg_accounting_name is not null

query.name: resource_group_to_federation
query.sql: SELECT OIMRG.name, OIMRE.wlcg_accounting_name FROM oim.resource OIMR JOIN oim.resource_resource_group OIMRRG ON OIMRRG.resource_id = OIMR.resource_id JOIN oim.resource_group OIMRG ON OIMRG.resource_group_id = OIMRRG.resource_group_id JOIN oim.resource_ext_attributes OIMRE ON OIMRE.resource_id= OIMR.resource_id WHERE OIMRE.wlcg_accounting_name is not null GROUP BY OIMRG.name

query.name: service_to_resource_all
query.sql: SELECT OIMS.name as service_type, OIMR.name, OIMRG.name as parent_name FROM oim.resource_service OIMRS JOIN oim.service OIMS ON OIMS.service_id = OIMRS.service_id JOIN oim.resource OIMR ON OIMRS.resource_id = OIMR.resource_id JOIN oim.resource_resource_group OIMRRG ON OIMRRG.resource_id = OIMR.resource_id JOIN oim.resource_group OIMRG ON OIMRG.resource_group_id = OIMRRG.resource_group_id WHERE OIMRG.osg_grid_type_id=1 and (OIMR.active=1 and OIMR.disable=0)

query.name: deployment_count
query.sql: SELECT time, COUNT(*) as deploy_count FROM (SELECT truncate( RSVM.timestamp / :span, 0 ) * :span as time, OIMR.fqdn as fqdn FROM rsvextra.metricdata RSVM JOIN oim.resource OIMR on RSVM.resource_id=OIMR.resource_id JOIN rsvextra.metricdetail RSVMD on RSVMD.id = RSVM.id JOIN oim.metric OIMM on OIMM.metric_id = RSVM.metric_id WHERE RSVMD.detail regexp :version AND RSVM.timestamp >= :starttime AND RSVM.timestamp < :endtime AND OIMM.name = 'org.osg.general.osg-version' GROUP BY time, fqdn ) as foo GROUP BY time

query.name: grid_deployment_count
query.sql: SELECT grid, time, COUNT(*) as deploy_count FROM (SELECT truncate( RSVM.timestamp / :span, 0 ) * :span as time, OIMR.fqdn, OIMGT.short_name as grid FROM rsvextra.metricdata RSVM JOIN oim.resource OIMR on RSVM.resource_id=OIMR.resource_id JOIN oim.resource_resource_group OIMRRG on OIMRRG.resource_id = OIMR.resource_id JOIN oim.resource_group OIMRG on OIMRRG.resource_group_id = OIMRG.resource_group_id JOIN oim.osg_grid_type OIMGT on OIMRG.osg_grid_type_id = OIMGT.grid_type_id JOIN rsvextra.metricdetail RSVMD on RSVMD.id = RSVM.id JOIN oim.metric OIMM on OIMM.metric_id = RSVM.metric_id WHERE RSVMD.detail regexp :version AND RSVM.timestamp >= :starttime AND RSVM.timestamp < :endtime AND OIMM.name = 'org.osg.general.osg-version' GROUP BY time, fqdn, grid ) as foo GROUP BY time, grid

query.name: version_deployment_count
query.sql: SELECT version, time, COUNT(*) as deploy_count FROM (SELECT truncate( RSVM.timestamp / :span, 0 ) * :span as time, OIMR.fqdn, left(RSVMD.detail, 9) as version FROM rsvextra.metricdata RSVM JOIN oim.resource OIMR on RSVM.resource_id=OIMR.resource_id JOIN oim.resource_resource_group OIMRRG on OIMRRG.resource_id = OIMR.resource_id JOIN oim.resource_group OIMRG on OIMRRG.resource_group_id = OIMRG.resource_group_id JOIN oim.osg_grid_type OIMGT on OIMRG.osg_grid_type_id = OIMGT.grid_type_id JOIN rsvextra.metricdetail RSVMD on RSVMD.id = RSVM.id JOIN oim.metric OIMM on OIMM.metric_id = RSVM.metric_id WHERE RSVMD.detail regexp :version AND RSVM.timestamp >= :starttime AND RSVM.timestamp < :endtime AND OIMM.name = 'org.osg.general.osg-version' GROUP BY time, fqdn, version ) as foo GROUP BY time, version
query.attribute: RSV Reporting Sites by OSG Version

query.name: vdt_version_deployment_count
query.sql: SELECT version, time, COUNT(*) as deploy_count FROM (SELECT truncate( RSVM.timestamp / :span, 0 ) * :span as time, OIMR.fqdn, concat('VDT-',substring(RSVMD.detail from 44 for 7)) as version FROM rsvextra.metricdata RSVM JOIN oim.resource OIMR on RSVM.resource_id=OIMR.resource_id JOIN oim.resource_resource_group OIMRRG on OIMRRG.resource_id = OIMR.resource_id JOIN oim.resource_group OIMRG on OIMRRG.resource_group_id = OIMRG.resource_group_id JOIN oim.osg_grid_type OIMGT on OIMRG.osg_grid_type_id = OIMGT.grid_type_id JOIN rsvextra.metricdetail RSVMD on RSVMD.id = RSVM.id JOIN oim.metric OIMM on OIMM.metric_id = RSVM.metric_id WHERE RSVMD.detail regexp :version AND RSVM.timestamp >= :starttime AND RSVM.timestamp < :endtime AND OIMM.name = 'org.osg.general.vdt-version' GROUP BY time, fqdn, version ) as foo GROUP BY time, version
query.attribute: RSV Reporting Sites by VDT Version

query.name: rsv_version_deployment_count
query.sql: SELECT version, time, COUNT(*) as deploy_count FROM (SELECT truncate( RSVM.timestamp / :span, 0 ) * :span as time, OIMR.fqdn, concat('RSV-', substring(RSVMD.detail, locate('OSG Resource and Service Validation (RSV)', RSVMD.detail)+42, 6)) as version FROM rsvextra.metricdata RSVM JOIN oim.resource OIMR on RSVM.resource_id=OIMR.resource_id JOIN oim.resource_resource_group OIMRRG on OIMRRG.resource_id = OIMR.resource_id JOIN oim.resource_group OIMRG on OIMRRG.resource_group_id = OIMRG.resource_group_id JOIN oim.osg_grid_type OIMGT on OIMRG.osg_grid_type_id = OIMGT.grid_type_id JOIN rsvextra.metricdetail RSVMD on RSVMD.id = RSVM.id JOIN oim.metric OIMM on OIMM.metric_id = RSVM.metric_id WHERE RSVMD.detail regexp :version AND RSVM.timestamp >= :starttime AND RSVM.timestamp < :endtime AND OIMM.name = 'org.osg.general.vdt-version' GROUP BY time, fqdn, version ) as foo GROUP BY time, version
query.attribute: RSV Reporting Sites by RSV Version

query.name: gip_version_deployment_count
query.sql: SELECT version, time, COUNT(*) as deploy_count FROM (SELECT truncate( RSVM.timestamp / :span, 0 ) * :span as time, OIMR.fqdn, concat('GIP-', substring(RSVMD.detail, locate('Generic Information Provider', RSVMD.detail)+29, 7)) as version FROM rsvextra.metricdata RSVM JOIN oim.resource OIMR on RSVM.resource_id=OIMR.resource_id JOIN oim.resource_resource_group OIMRRG on OIMRRG.resource_id = OIMR.resource_id JOIN oim.resource_group OIMRG on OIMRRG.resource_group_id = OIMRG.resource_group_id JOIN oim.osg_grid_type OIMGT on OIMRG.osg_grid_type_id = OIMGT.grid_type_id JOIN rsvextra.metricdetail RSVMD on RSVMD.id = RSVM.id JOIN oim.metric OIMM on OIMM.metric_id = RSVM.metric_id WHERE RSVMD.detail regexp :version AND RSVM.timestamp >= :starttime AND RSVM.timestamp < :endtime AND OIMM.name = 'org.osg.general.vdt-version' GROUP BY time, fqdn, version ) as foo GROUP BY time, version
query.attribute: RSV Reporting Sites by GIP Version

query.name: rsv_metric_quality
query.sql: SELECT OIMM.name as name, from_unixtime(truncate(RSVM.timestamp/:span, 0)*:span) as time, SUM(CASE OIMMS.metric_status_description WHEN "OK" THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE OIMMS.metric_status_description WHEN "OK" THEN 0 WHEN "UNKNOWN" THEN :countunknown ELSE 1 END) from rsvextra.metricdata RSVM join oim.resource OIMR on RSVM.resource_id=OIMR.resource_id join oim.metric_status OIMMS on RSVM.metric_status_id = OIMMS.metric_status_id join oim.metric OIMM on OIMM.metric_id = RSVM.metric_id where RSVM.timestamp >= :starttime AND RSVM.timestamp < :endtime AND OIMR.fqdn regexp :facility AND OIMM.name regexp :metric group by name, time

query.name: rsv_count
query.sql: select OIMR.fqdn as fqdn, from_unixtime(truncate(RSVM.timestamp/:span, 0)*:span) as time, COUNT(*) from rsvextra.metricdata RSVM join oim.resource OIMR on RSVM.resource_id=OIMR.resource_id where RSVM.timestamp >= :starttime AND RSVM.timestamp < :endtime AND OIMR.fqdn regexp :facility group by fqdn, time

query.name: rsv_dist
query.sql: select OIMMS.metric_status_description, COUNT(*) from rsvextra.metricdata RSVM join oim.metric_status OIMMS on RSVM.metric_status_id = OIMMS.metric_status_id join oim.resource OIMR on RSVM.resource_id=OIMR.resource_id where RSVM.timestamp >= :starttime AND RSVM.timestamp < :endtime AND OIMR.fqdn regexp :facility group by OIMMS.metric_status_description

query.name: failed_tests
query.sql: select SummaryData, GatheredAt, DetailsData, MetricType from MetricRecord where Timestamp >=:errorstart AND Timestamp < :errorstart + INTERVAL :span seconds

query.name: critical_tests
query.sql:
SELECT m.name as metric_name, s.name as service_name FROM oim.metric m JOIN oim.metric_service ms ON ms.metric_id=m.metric_id JOIN oim.service s ON s.service_id=ms.service_id WHERE ms.critical=1
Critical Tests by Service Type

query.name: ownership
query.sql: SELECT r.name, v.short_name, o.percent FROM oim.vo_resource_ownership o JOIN oim.virtualorganization v on v.vo_id = o.vo_id JOIN oim.resource r on r.resource_id = o.resource_id

query.name: resources
query.sql: SELECT r.name, r.fqdn FROM oim.resource r GROUP BY r.name
